text.#text:
Any reference in any law, regulation, document, record, map, or other paper of the United States to
			 the Johnson Valley Off-Highway Vehicle Recreation Area is deemed to be a
			 reference to the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4371 IH: To redesignate the Johnson Valley Off-Highway Vehicle Recreation Area in California as the “Johnson Valley National Off-Highway Vehicle Recreation Area”, and for other purposes.
